pageContext.title: We built an AI-powered virtual recruiter for DBS Bank. Ask me anything!
pageContext.content:
NOTE: This AMA has ended. Find the Q&A with Sudhanshu in the comments.

Hey TIA community!

Iâ€™m Sudhanshu, CEO and co-founder at Impress.ai. Based in Singapore, I lead a department consisting of teams that look after business strategy, product optimization, and market expansion.

Impress.ai is an AI-powered chatbot for recruiters which interviews hundreds of candidates every day. Our technology helps improve the way enterprise businesses like DBS Bank and Accenture approach talent acquisition and qualify top candidates from a high volume of applications. More than that, we use elements of machine learning and I/O psychology to ensure candidates receive a positive and engaging recruitment experience.

Before Impress.ai, I was the CEO at Ideatory, a platform which created candidate assessments. Prior to that, I was a student at NTU with dreams of one day running my own tech startup. In my spare time, I enjoy reading science fiction and business books as well as cooking vegan food!

You can ask me anything. Some of the topics Iâ€™d love to discuss include:

  • What itâ€™s like to start a business as a millennial in Singapore
  • Anything about AI, machine learning, and chatbots
  • Predictions, myths, and trends within the HR tech industry
  • How entrepreneurs can achieve work-life balance

I look forward to answering your questions!

Note fromÂ Putra, TIAâ€™s head of community content:Â The host may choose at his preference to not answer particular questions. The AMA is moderated by the community managers, so letâ€™s keep the questions friendly.Â ðŸ™‚
